@webdoc/example > ExampleFactory

ExampleFactory 

class ExampleFactory

ExampleFactory can be used to build examples.

// TODO: Make the API interesting
ExampleFactory.getInstance()
 .build()

Constructor

new ExampleFactory(context: ExampleContext) → {}

This constructor should only be used for custom contexts.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
context ExampleContext

<optional>

 null

A custom context for the factory.
